channel.title: 718 sell price

item.title: 718 sell price
item.dc:creator: @adamgulka adamgulka
item.description:
@adamgulka wrote:

Ok so i want to make a ticket worth 1m cash, buy price and sell price.
I know how to make the buy price 1m, but im not sure where to edit the sell priceâ€¦
In shop.java i tried this, ripped straight from my 667,

[CODE] public static int getBuyPrice(Item item) {
return ItemManager.getPrice(item.getId());
switch (item.getId()) {
case 24953:
item.getDefinitions().setValue(1000000);//buying price
break;
}
return item.getDefinitions().getValue();
}

public static int getSellPrice(Item item) {
	return (int) (getBuyPrice(item) / 1.2);
            switch (item.getId()) {
	case 24953:
                    item.getDefinitions().setValue(1000000);//buying price
                    break;		
            }
            return item.getDefinitions().getValue();	
}[/CODE]

But it didnt work, got errors about the switch statement.

So if anyone can tell me how to edit the sell price of an item, that would be swell.

Read full topic
